member.name: T:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryAclExtensions
member.summary: Provides Windows-specific static extension methods for manipulating Access Control List (ACL) security attributes for registry keys.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryAclExtensions.GetAccessControl(Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey)
member.summary: Returns the security information of a registry key.
member.param: The existing registry key from which to obtain the security information.
member.returns: The security descriptors of all the access control sections of the registry key.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryAclExtensions.GetAccessControl(Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey,System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlSections)
member.summary: Returns the security information of a registry key.
member.param: An existing registry key from which to obtain the security information.
The desired access control sections to retrieve.
member.returns: The security descriptors of the specified access control sections of the registry key.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Win32.RegistryAclExtensions.SetAccessControl(Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey,System.Security.AccessControl.RegistrySecurity)
member.summary: Changes the security attributes of an existing registry key.
member.param: The security information to apply to the registry key.
